articles.title: WT20 Challenge: Shafali, Wolvaardt dazzle as Velocity beat Supernovas

articles.author: Swati Deshpande
articles.title: BEST to HC: Tata Motors' bid had 'deviations'
articles.description: The BEST said Tata Motor’s petition is not maintainable in law as it was declared "technically non-responsive" on May 6 and hence has no right to be heard or question the tender process, on interpretation of its terms and conditions.
